text: The Garnet Bracelet () is a 1964 Soviet drama film directed by Abram Room.Жителям Лосиноостровского района покажут фильмы Абрама РоомаВечерний кинозал в Кракове помогает студентам знакомиться с русской культуройЛучшие фильмы, которые нужно бы показать российским детям (список) == Plot == A Russian official falls in love with a young lady, but she does not reciprocate.Гранатовый браслет == Cast == * Ariadna Shengelaia as Vera Nikolayevna (as Ariadna Shengelaya) * Igor Ozerov as Zheltkov * Oleg Basilashvili as Vasily Lvovitch * Vladislav Strzhelchik as Nikolai Nikolayevich * Natalya Malyavina as Anna Nikolayevna (as N. Malyavina) * Yuri Averin as Von Friesse (as Yu. Averin) * Olga Zhizneva as Mme. Zarzhitskaya * Leonid Gallis as AnosovГранатовый браслет (1965) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1964 films Category:Russian- language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films Category:1964 drama films
title: The Garnet Bracelet (film)
